Jurgen Klopp has hinted that Wednesday's trip to Newcastle will come too soon for Thiago Alcantara.

“I don't know if he can [play]. It's not really likely, let me say it like this.” #awlfc [liverpool echo]

Klopp: “He needs a few sessions, he was really out for a long time after a really harsh challenge and it was a proper impact. Nothing ruptured, nothing broke, but it still took time obviously. This takes time so we cannot rush things. So I don't know."

Klopp: "I like watching all my boys playing and Thiago, he's only played a few minutes before he got injured, so of course we are looking forward to that.”
